title: Basella alba
Vernacular name:
English- vine spinach
Hindi- Poi
Gujarati- Valchi Bhagi
Sanskrit-Upodika
Chemical Constituents: proteins, fat, vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin E, vitamin K, vitamin B9 (folic acid), riboflavin, niacin, thiamine and minerals
Therapeutic uses: Basella alba is reported to improve testosterone levels in males, thus boosting libido..
